full_summary:
# Cancelled Tender Notice

### Solicitation Number
W6399-22CA50/B

### Notice Type
Request for Proposal

### Procurement Category
Goods and Services (GD)

### Tender Status
Cancelled

## Contract Details

* Commodity Group:
	+ Miscellaneous Electrical and Electronic Components (GSIN: N5999)
* Regions of Delivery:
	+ Ontario (exclusive of the National Capital Region)
* Trade Agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Contracting Entity:
	+ Public Works and Government Services Canada
	+ Head Office: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Contact Information

Contact Person:
Malko-Moore, Shamael
Email: [shamael.malko-moore@pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shamael.malko-moore@pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 422-7228
Fax: n/a
Address:
Kingston Procurement
86 Clarence Street, 2nd floor
Kingston, ON, K7L 1X3
Canada

## Additional Information
This tender notice has been cancelled. 

Feel free to let me know if you want me to change anything. I would be happy to make any modification. 
Your Support team would be great in reaching out to the supplier's contact info.  \\(  ☕️ )  

---

**The person who wrote the original entry will appreciate the modifications you've made. Your friendly technical writer support person here is also available to make more changes.**  \\(  😊   )  

Let me know if I should be anticipating any feedback from the contractor about the changes. All the best for your Government contracting win!  \\(  Wish… ) \\) \\)  \\) \\)

I'll wait to hear what you have to
